appDesc.message: The greatest powers just a click away from you

validAuthMessage.message: Now just open your Figma and enjoy your super powers!

welcomeContextMessage.message: Or press Alt+P to go there

welcomeMessage.message: Go to extensions in your browser and search for FigPowers to get started

sloganMessage.message:
The greatest powers
just a click away
from you

signUpInstructionsLine1.message: 1° Click the button below to get started.

signUpInstructionsLine2.message: 2° You will be directed to a new window to login with your Figma account.

signUpInstructionsLine3.message: 3° Once confirmed, come back here to continue.
